main event: A potential unidentified flying object was reported in Portland, Oregon on November 6, 1957, during a radar-visual observation.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 10 minutes,The object was described as having brightness and a trail similar to a jet aircraft,The sighting was considered a probable aircraft sighting,Two observers reported different characteristics of the object,It was noted that one observer saw a red light in the sky.
sighted object: one unidentified object resembling a jet aircraft
witness description: one female housewife and one male employee of Boyd Rubber Co.
